articles.title: Layoffs at PNC cut across business lines and geography - American Banker
articles.description: The job cuts came after CEO Bill Demchak said in July that he was "taking a hard look" at opportunities to reduce expenses. PNC joins a growing list of banks that have laid off workers amid declining growth prospects.
articles.content:
PNC Financial Services Group laid off employees across both its geographic footprint and its business lines this week, the latest example of downsizing in the U.S. banking industry.
